feature.name: Audio Analyzer
feature.description: Processes normalized audio data and extracts frequency spectrum and amplitude values in real-time using Web Audio API.

tests.description: Analyzer receives AudioBuffer from Audio Adapter
Analyzer outputs frequency data as Float32Array (FFT)
Analyzer outputs current amplitude as normalized 0-1 value
Analyzer emits data at consistent frame rate (~60fps or requestAnimationFrame)
Frequency data contains at least 64 bands
Analyzer continues outputting zero values when no audio is playing
Analyzer can be paused and resumed
Analyzer properly disconnects and cleans up on destroy()

priorDecisions: Use Web Audio API AnalyserNode for FFT and amplitude
Event emitter pattern for async callbacks
AudioBufferReceiver interface for receiving buffers from AudioAdapter
context.notes: AudioAnalyzer should implement AudioBufferReceiver interface to integrate with AudioAdapter.connect()
